00037 *                       Leds.
00038 * \author

00041 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00042 
00043 #include PLATFORM_HEADER
00044 #include BOARD_HEADER
00045 #include "hal/micro/led.h"
00046 #include "hal/micro/micro-common.h"
00047 #include "hal/micro/cortexm3/micro-common.h"
00048 
00049 
00050 #include "contiki-conf.h"
00051 #include "dev/leds.h"
00052 
00053 /**
00054  * @brief Read single GPIO bit from PxOUT
00055  *
00056  * @param io  The io pin to use, can be specified with the convenience macros
00057  *            PORTA_PIN(), PORTB_PIN(), PORTC_PIN()
00058  * @return Bit value: 1 if bit is set, 0 otherwise.
00059  *
00060  */
00061 
00062 int8u halGpioGetPxOUT(int32u gpio)
00063 {
00064   if(gpio/8 < 3) {
00065       return (*((volatile int32u *)(GPIO_PxOUT_BASE+(GPIO_Px_OFFSET*(gpio/8)))) & BIT(gpio&7) ) == 0 ? 0 : 1 ;
00066   }
00067   return 0;
00068 }
00069 
00070 /**
00071  * @brief Read single GPIO bit from PxIN
00072  *
00073  * @param io  The io pin to use, can be specified with the convenience macros
00074  *            PORTA_PIN(), PORTB_PIN(), PORTC_PIN()
00075  * @return Bit value: 1 if bit is set, 0 otherwise.
00076  *
00077  */
00078 
00079 int8u halGpioGetPxIN(int32u gpio)
00080 {
00081   if(gpio/8 < 3) {
00082       return (*((volatile int32u *)(GPIO_PxIN_BASE+(GPIO_Px_OFFSET*(gpio/8)))) & BIT(gpio&7) ) == 0 ? 0 : 1 ;
00083   }
00084   return 0;
00085 }
00086 
00087 
00088 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00089 void
00090 leds_arch_init(void)
00091 {   
00092   halInitLed();
00093 }
00094 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00095 unsigned char
00096 leds_arch_get(void)
00097 {
00098     return (halGpioGetPxOUT(LEDS_CONF_GREEN) ? 0 : LEDS_GREEN)
00099         | (halGpioGetPxOUT(LEDS_CONF_YELLOW) ? 0 : LEDS_YELLOW)
00100         | (halGpioGetPxOUT(LEDS_CONF_RED) ? 0 : LEDS_RED);
00101 }
00102 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00103 void
00104 leds_arch_set(unsigned char leds)
00105 {
00106   halGpioSet(LEDS_CONF_GREEN, !(leds & LEDS_GREEN));
00107   halGpioSet(LEDS_CONF_YELLOW, !(leds & LEDS_YELLOW));
00108   halGpioSet(LEDS_CONF_RED, !(leds & LEDS_RED));
00109 }
00110 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
